items.sentence: I can\'t believe you don\'t want to at least look out the window.
I can\'t think of a single reason why we shouldn\'t go there now.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want to eat before the concert.
Tom said that he did nothing wrong and that it wasn\'t his fault.
We couldn\'t open the door because it was locked from the inside.
You can go out, as long as you promise to be back by 11 o\'clock.
Within a few minutes, Tom had eaten up all the food on the table.
I wonder whether or not Tom has told Mary she shouldn\'t do that.
When was the last time that you told your wife she was beautiful?
When was the last time you had to deal with this kind of problem?
It took Tom a few weeks to get used to working in his new office.
Oil has played an important part in the progress of civilization.
The teacher would only allow us to speak French in the classroom.
You were always good at getting Tom to do what you wanted him to.
I don\'t think we\'ll have any problem raising the money we need.
I was born in Boston, but I\'ve lived in Chicago most of my life.
Tom showed up at the party by himself, just like I knew he would.
Tom smothered Mary to death with a pillow while she was sleeping.
I know we\'ve had problems, but I think they\'ve all been solved.
It was a nice place to visit, but I wouldn\'t want to live there.
Tom understands French a lot better than everyone thinks he does.
Tom walked into the kitchen with a fly swatter in his right hand.
Tom was wearing a dinner jacket when I saw him a few minutes ago.
Washington, D.C., is the capital of the United States of America.
We got stuck in a traffic jam, which made us twenty minutes late.
Tom thinks Mary is in Boston, but she\'s actually in Chicago now.
Tom swore to Mary that he wasn\'t the one who stole her necklace.
Tom claims that he accidentally shot Mary while cleaning his gun.
Tom knew that he didn\'t have enough money to buy what he wanted.
Tom went to school even though his doctor told him he shouldn\'t.
Have you thought about what time of year you want to get married?
It isn\'t likely that Tom will shed any tears if Mary gets fired.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between astronomy and astrology.
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary has decided to give her old guitar to.
Tom knows that he needs to do something, but he\'s not sure what.
It probably wouldn\'t have been difficult to do that by yourself.
I was lucky the train was late. Otherwise, I would\'ve missed it.
I\'ll tell Tom what needs to be done the next time I talk to him.
He was curious about how it would taste, so he took a small bite.
How much more money do we need to spend to complete this project?
How would you feel if someone said something like that about you?
I always just took it for granted that you would be there for me.
Tom resented the fact that Mary got the promotion instead of him.
Tom said that neither one of his parents had ever been to Boston.
Tom saw two men lying on the floor, bleeding from gunshot wounds.
Tom should have been eating more vegetables and not as much meat.
Even though Tom entered the room, Mary didn\'t stop kissing John.
Could you please tell me how tall you are and how much you weigh?
Do you really care when I get this done as long as I get it done?
Tom couldn\'t have finished writing the report without your help.
